_json.gridTitle: Are You Being Too Nice? Not Uncommon for Chronically Ill - Rest Ministries - Chronic Illness and Pain Support
_json.description: Are You Being Too Nice? (maybe doing it all to prove your illness doesn't hold you back?) When we live with illness we can easily feel guilty about all that we cannot do, perhaps how our family misses out on things because of our disease. To compensate, it is easy to give in to everything they want that we are "somewhat" capable of. We are all guilty of being too nice when we should have set healthy boundaries instead. And just because we can do something, doesn't mean we should.
